question:
You are getting married. Write a letter to an English-speaking friend to invite him/her to the wedding. In your letter:
* describe who you are going to marry,* tell the schedule
* explain why it’s important him/her be at the wedding.
text: I hope this letter finds you in good health. I’m glad to inform you that I am getting married soon and I’m writing to you to invite you to the occasion.

Firstly, it is an arranged marriage and my family chooses this person for him. Currently, he is working as an income-tax inspector and earned a good remuneration. Moreover, I also feel that he is too kind and caring nature.
The wedding date is 24 December 2022 but you have to come one week before it because you promised me earlier. Furthermore, celebrations will start on 22nd December.
And, I want you to be present on my special day and you’ll also have a chance to meet our old school friends after a long time. I am sure that you’ll definitely enjoy the function.
I would love to see you soon. Pay regards to your parents.
